name: UIPopoverPresentationControllerDelegate
desc: The methods of the UIPopoverPresentationControllerDelegate protocol let you customize the behavior of a popover-based presentation. A popover presentation controller notifies your delegate at appropriate points during the presentation process. You can use the delegate methods to customize this process and respond to changes dynamically.

items.name: func prepareForPopoverPresentation(UIPopoverPresentationController)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the popover is about to be presented.
